phrase: I sit at the keyboard all day long and recently I've been having some numbness and tingling in my hand.

mostly when I'm typing on the keyboard is when I experience the pain.

i've been taking ibuprofen ibuprofen and seem not typing on the keyboard helps the most.

positive tinel's sign in alexis what is going on is that you have a carpal tunnel syndrome.
